original_text: Then Jacob offered sacrifice upon the mount, and called his brethren to eat bread: and they did eat bread, and tarried all night in the mount.
korean_text: 야곱이 또 산에서 제사를 드리고 형제들을 불러 떡을 먹이니 그들이 떡을 먹고 산에서 밤을 지내고

sentences.original_text: Then Jacob offered sacrifice upon the mount
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 야곱이 산 위에 제사를 드렸고

sentences.original_text: and called his brethren to eat bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 형제들을 불러 떡을 먹게 했으며

sentences.original_text: and tarried all night in the mount
